nodes.text: The Ndowi were one of several nomadic Socorran tribes which inhabited the planet Socorro and were the only indigenous group which didn't live in the desert wastes. They were also the least nomadic of the four main tribes, having established a series of villages along the Rym Mountains. However, the Ndowi were also the smallest in number, with the entire tribe made up of less than 1,000 members at the height of the New Order.
